<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/{organisation}/events"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new event and stores its location.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"organisation","in":"path","description":"Organisation slug","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"organisation"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Event details","required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["name","starts_at","ends_at","location","capacity"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"starts_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"ends_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"banner":{"type":"string"},"category":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"capacity":{"type":"integer"},"description":{"type":"string"},"location":{"type":"object","required":["name","lat","lng"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"address":{"type":"string"},"lat":{"type":"number"},"lng":{"type":"number"},"ksuid":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CreateEventRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
